about_the_game:
Waste Walkers

The Support Pack DLC is for people who'd like to show their continued support towards us at Corrosive Studios and to help us continue to grow and do what we do while also giving you a head start in the game by rewarding your character with some unique power ups that are otherwise only found in the game at one point! They increase all attributes and help make your character even stronger! This will give you three of them so you can use them on your own character, or divide them up amongst your party!

Support Pack DLC:
  • 3x Corrosive Support Pack (consumable)
  • 2x Caustic Bomb (grenade)

PLEASE NOTE: STARTING A NEW GAME WILL BE REQUIRED TO ACCESS THE ITEMS. THEY ARE GRANTED IMMEDIATELY AFTER CHARACTER CREATION!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible
